publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5169 Karen Whitefield: Christmas Day and New Year’s Day Trading (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Christmas Day and New Year’s Day Trading (Scotland) Bill.

S2M-5169 Karen Whitefield: Christmas Day and New Year’s Day Trading (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Christmas Day and New Year’s Day Trading (Scotland) Bill.
